lankawe janawargika arbudaye dishanathiya sampurnayen wenas kala siduwimak washayen pamanak nowa parlimenthu prajathanthrawadayata ella kala maru paharak washayen da 1983/08/08 wanida sammatha kala 06 wani wyawastha sanshodhanaya salakenawa. 1977 maha mathiwaranayen wipaksha nayakathwayata path wu drawida eksath wimukthi peramunata parlimenthu manthridhura ahimi kale mema sanshodhanaya maginuyi.
